comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Not sure what it was then, but that big building in the background is part of St. Luke's Hospital now, on W 113th St. If this link works, here's a Google map: maps.google.com/maps?q=cathedral+of+st.+john+the+divine&a...
